feed.title: Immich Public Proxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Public Proxy: 1.9.0
entry.content:
Breaking change

76 The allowDownloadAll config setting has been changed from a boolean to an int. Any existing deployments that have a value of true will now start following the setting for that share inside Immich (see image below).

allowDownloadAll: Allow visitors to download all files as a zip. - 0 disable downloads - 1 follow Immich setting per share (Existing users with true will follow this setting) - 2 always allowed to download, regardless of the Immich per-share setting

entry.title: New release for Immich Public Proxy: 1.9.1
entry.content: • 72 Add an og-image taken from the gallery's first thumbnail.

entry.title: New release for Immich Public Proxy: 1.10.0
entry.content:
ðŸš¨ Critical update

It is critical to install this version if you're using Immich 1.132+

  • Fix issue from Immich 1.132+ which removed album assets from the shared link. See issue #87

entry.title: New release for Immich Public Proxy: 1.11.0
entry.content:
• 27 #77 Add caption from Immich image description. Enable/disable this in config.json.

  • 66 Replaced wget with curl to see if this resolves zombie processes.

entry.title: New release for Immich Public Proxy: 1.11.1
entry.content: • 27 Fix issue with missing description on lazy loaded images
